H

Hall - Class in seatservice.domain
This class presents a single hall in the movie theater.
Hall() - Constructor for class seatservice.domain.Hall
This constructor is used only when the xml file functioning as the database for halls is unmarshalled into objects of this class.
Hall(String, int, int) - Constructor for class seatservice.domain.Hall
Creates a hashmap that represents the seats within the hall.
HallAdder - Class in seatservice.filehandling
This class is responsible for adding new halls to the movie theater's database (which is an xml file)
HallAdder(String, Halls) - Constructor for class seatservice.filehandling.HallAdder
Sets name of the xml file containing the information on the halls and also sets the halls instance variable to the one given as the parameter
hallExists(String) - Method in class seatservice.filehandling.HallHandler
Checks that that there is no hall with the given name yet
hallExistsAlready(String, Command) - Method in class seatservice.userinterface.logic.InputErrorHandler
This method checks if there already exists a hall with the given name.
HallHandler - Class in seatservice.filehandling
This class abstracts the HallAdder, HallParser and HallRemover classes so that they're all used through this single class
HallHandler() - Constructor for class seatservice.filehandling.HallHandler
Sets a default file path and initializes all the other instance variables.
HallNamesListener - Class in seatservice.userinterface.listeners
A listener for the JlisthallNames variable in the GUI.

This class is responsible for unmarshalling the xml file functioning as the database

The constructor sets the default filepath for the xml file and sets the halls instance variable.

This class is responsible for removing any wanted halls from the xml database file

The method checks that the values of the rowsTextField and seatsTextField are fine - that is, the values must be integers and they must be above zero.

S

Seat - Class in seatservice.domain
This class represents a single seat within a hall of the movie theater The seat is represented as a button, which changes its color depending on its state of availability
Seat() - Constructor for class seatservice.domain.Seat
The constructor sets the default state of this seat to available and any text it contains to non focusable
SeatClickListener - Class in seatservice.userinterface.listeners
This class is responsible for listening the user's clicks in the part of the UI that shows all the seats of halls visually
